scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary seated, holding the Christ Child who reaches out towards a figure kneeling in prayer. To the left of the Virgin, an angel with red and blue wings gazes down, holding a green parrot. To the right of the Christ Child, another angel in red offers a small object, possibly fruit. In the background, a walled city with towers and buildings is visible under a blue sky with clouds. In the foreground, a man in a red robe kneels with his hands clasped in prayer amidst a garden with flowers. To the far left, a stone tower and buildings with pitched roofs are depicted.
scene_interpretation: Madonna and Child with Angels and Donor
